author: Al Jazeera
title: Teddy bear hunt goes viral
description: A book written 30 years ago comes to life to help children under lockdown.
content:
A third of the worlds population is now living under lockdown to contain coronavirus.
The lockdown is particularly challenging for children who must stay indoors, away from their schools and friends.
